Original:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you should flee before
anybody get hurt.

it: Il tuo Party è al completo.

Original: Online shopping is subjected to tariffs!
en: Online shopping is subjected to tariffs!
it: Lo shopping online è soggetto a dazi!
Fidati solo del tuo negoziante locale!

Original: Who knows? I'm full of surprises!
en: Who knows? I'm full of surprises!
it: Chi lo sa? Sono pieno di sorprese!

Original:
Change class? You will return at LV.1 but keep all
your skills

Since you are under LV.10 you can change your class, but
you will forget all your skills.
You will also return to LV.1
You need to be at least LV.10 to change your class
en: You need to be at least LV.10 to change your class
it: Devi essere almeno al LV.10 per cambiare classe

Original: Access to the server room is prohibithed.
en: Access to the server room is prohibithed.

it: Viaggiare verso la mappa del mondo?

Original:
The rest of the world is still a work in progress,
come back when the full game releases!
Whoa! You trekked all the way to the tower?
en: Whoa! You trekked all the way to the tower?
it: Wow! Hai fatto tutta la strada fino alla torre?

Original:
Didn't you know that there is a easier way to
get to the tower? Just take the Hypermetro!

How did you manage to survive the arcane mist 
and stuff in the first place?

I'm trying to make this tower self sufficient 
you know?

The Hypermetro is the only lifeline
connecting this place to the rest of the world.

But what happens if a PSIterrorist dedices to
blow up the tunnels? We will be all starve to death
or be forced to eat monsters that lives in
upper floors
Hmm... so you *walked* from Beagle to here?"
en: Hmm... so you *walked* from Beagle to here?"
it:
Hmm... quindi sei venuto a piedi da Beagle fino a
qui?

Original:
Through the arcane neurotoxic mist and stuff?
You must be serious about this.

Let me explain to you the situation:
We're currently stationed inside an *anomalous skyscraper*
Reality isn't really consistent the higher you go.
en: Reality isn't really consistent the higher you go.
it:
La realtà non è più coerente man mano che si sale
in alto.

Original:
Our job is to explore, document, and archive everything
we find and we’re actively recruiting explorers and
freelancers.

When you're stocked up and feel ready, 
you can begin exploring by going to the Hypernet
point upstairs

Be warned, though—each floor above us follows its own rules. 
Gravity gets weird, logic bends in weird ways, 
and time itself may lose its grip.
But that's exactly why you're here
it: But that's exactly why you're here
Hai trovato lo strozzatore anti-S PSI!

Original:
This experience is not what you think it is. 
Long forgotten a shadow, will never bring light.
Good luck and DON'T fuck it up!
en: Good luck and DON'T fuck it up!
it: Buona fortuna e NON rovinare tutto!
È stata ritrovata la bacchetta magica giocattolo!
Hai trovato un Pesce avvolto in una foglia!
Hai trovato un Navigatore GPS portatile!
Hai trovato un Disinfettante per le mani!
Hai trovato uno Zaino da viaggio!
Hai trovato una Falsa mappa del tesoro!
Hai trovato il Tamburo del viaggiatore
Hai trovato un Set di utensili!
Hai trovato una Action figure di un combattente!
Hai trovato un Risotto ai funghi!

Original:
Every month, the moon descends to earth 
and sits atop the temple roof
She bleeds milk and worms.
it:
Ogni mese, la luna scende sulla terra
e si siede sul tetto del tempio.
Sanguina latte e vermi.

Original:
The village cats line up to lick it, 
hoping for sweet dreams.
One night, one of them dares to ask her, 
'Do you dream, moon?'
it:
I gatti del villaggio si mettono in fila per leccarla,
sperando in sogni dolci.
Una notte, uno di loro osa chiederle:
“Tu sogni, luna?”

Original:
She crushes him with a giant foot 
she didn’t have before.
'Yes,' she says. 'I dream that none 
of you exist anymore.'
it:
Lei lo schiaccia con un piede gigante
che prima non aveva.
“Sì,” dice. “Sogno che nessuno
di voi esista più.”

Original:
...And that’s just how life was in 
my village, out in the 
Free States of the Midwest.
it:
…Ed è così che andavano le cose
nel mio villaggio, là fuori
negli Stati Liberi del Midwest.

Original:
I fuckin' love America dude, but Old Europe is
pretty neat.
it:
Amo fottutamente l’America, fratè, ma la Vecchia Europa
è una figata.

Original:
I fuckin' love America dudette, but Old Europe is
pretty neat.
it:
Amo fottutamente l’America, sorella, ma la Vecchia Europa
è una figata.

Original:
I fuckin' love America dud*, but Old Europe is
pretty neat.
it:
Amo fottutamente l’America, amico*, ma la Vecchia Europa
è una figata.

Original: You found a set of basic items!
en: You found a set of basic items!
it: Hai trovato un set di oggetti di base!

Original:
Hello \N[1] i'm Selene from HQ!
Welcome to the Omega Tower!
en:
Hello \N[1] i'm Selene from HR!
Welcome to the Omega Tower!
it:
Ciao \N[1]! Sono Selene delle risorse umane!
Benvenuto nella Torre Omega!

Original:
Here is your free starting kit, just 
like it was promised in the promo pamphlet!
en:
Here is your free starting kit, just 
like it was promised in the promo pamphlet!
it:
Troverai armi, vestiti, cianfrusaglie
e roba taumaturgica che abbiamo preparato 
Per le nuove reclute.

Original:
You’ll find weapons, clothes, trinkets and
thamaturgical stuff we’ve put together for new recruits.
en:
You’ll find weapons, clothes, trinkets and
thamaturgical stuff we’ve put together for new recruits.
it:
Ecco il tuo kit iniziale gratuito,
proprio come promesso nel volantino promozionale!

Original: And yes, it even includes a gun!
it: E si, include anche una pistola!

Original:
Make sure to visit our \C[1]Training center\C[0],
just take the the stairs below
it:
Non dimenticare di visitare il nostro
\C[1]Centro d’addestramento\C[0],
basta scendere le scale qui sotto.
Il prossimo treno è di nuovo in ritardo.

Original: Not sure if this goes to Lisbon or not.
it: Non so se questo va a Lisbona o no.

Original:
They raised fares again, and for what?
I've already owe Esoteric Heavy Industries
like 15% of my soul.
it:
Hanno alzato ancora i biglietti, e per cosa?
Devo già il 15% della mia anima a Esoteric Heavy Industries.

Original:
If something blocks your path...just shove it!
Press \C[1]C\C[0] to shove or break the item in
front of you.
it:
Se qualcosa blocca il tuo cammino… spingilo via!
Premi \C[1]C\C[0] per spingere o rompere
l’oggetto davanti a te.

Original:
You can also shove people and creatures
but be careful about not throwing anybody
on the rails!
it:
Puoi anche spingere persone e creature,
ma fai attenzione a non buttarle sui binari!
hai trovato delle Scarpe da corsa!
Hai trovato uno Spray nasale salino!
È stata rinvenuta una Spada mesopotamica!

Original:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you can always flee at the
first turn without taking damage.
it:
Se incontri un nemico di alto livello che può shottare
te e i tuoi amici, puoi sempre fuggire
al primo turno senza subire danni.

Original:
You can select a new skill to train
in the training menu, win battles to gain
learning points.
it:
Puoi selezionare una nuova abilità da allenare
nel menu di addestramento, vinci battaglie per ottenere
punti apprendimento.

Original:
...or you can just buy a online course online
that will teach you that skill or spell, but they
are pretty pricey.
it:
...oppure puoi semplicemente comprare un corso online
che ti insegnerà quella skill o incantesimo, ma
costano un bel po’.
Metti su un po' di muscoli!

Original:
You absorbed the creature.
You are now just like them,

In \C[1]Permadeath mode\C[0] if your character perish in battle
you will have to create a new one.
Loot the body of your past character to recover items and
euros.
en:
In \C[1]Permadeath mode\C[0] if your character perish in battle
you will have to create a new one.
Loot the body of your past character to recover items and
euros.

Original:
In \C[1]Standard mode\C[0] if your character get defeated
during battle will rewake at the base floor of the dungeon.
Your allies will still die if they are not resurrected
by the end of the battle.
en:
In \C[1]Lite mode\C[0] if your character get defeated
during battle will rewake at the base floor of the dungeon.
Your allies will still die if they are not resurrected
by the end of the battle.

Original: That mutt used tae be my man. Name was Fergus.
it: Quel bastardino era il mio uomo. Si chiamava Fergus.

Original:
Then some daft bastard of a wizard cursed him, 
fer shits and bloody giggles.
it:
Poi qualche stronzo di mago l’ha maledetto,
solo per ridere tra merda e sangue.

Original:
Wasn’t quick, naw. First, his nails curled 
back ' split like old kindling, then teeth 
fell out in chunks.
it:
Non è stato veloce, no. Prima gli si sono arricciate le unghie
all’indietro, si sono spezzate come legna vecchia, poi i denti
gli sono caduti a pezzi.

Original:
He screamed like I never heard before, not even 
when our son died in the Psychic Wars.
it:
Ha urlato come non l’avevo mai sentito, neanche
quando nostro figlio è morto nelle Guerre Psichiche.

Original:
I held him while his legs bent wrong 
ways an’ his jaw stretched out like taffy. 
Screamin’ turned to whimperin’.
it:
L’ho tenuto mentre le gambe gli si piegavano male
e la mascella si allungava come gomma galvanizzata.
Dalle urla ai lamenti.

Original:
So listen: take him into the dungeon.
Let him die in glory, not pissin’ on his
own paws.
it:
Quindi ascolta: portalo nel dungeon.
Fallo morire con onore, non mentre si piscia
Addosso.

Original:
And don’t bring him back, ye hear? 
He’s already gone.
it:
E non riportarlo indietro, hai capito?
Lui è già andato.

Original:
I watched my man rot away inside that mutt
day by day.
it:
Ho guardato il mio uomo marcire dentro quel cane
giorno dopo giorno.

Original:
I miss when he did the damn dishes.
Let the elder gods sort him out.
it:
Mi manca quando lavava i dannati piatti.
Che ci pensino gli dei antichi.

Original:
I love the quiet up here, away from the upper
layers noise.
it:
Amo il silenzio quassù, lontano dal casino
degli strati superiori.

Original:
We bake everything right here, no frozen 
shipped stuff from the continent.
it:
Cuociamo tutto qui, niente roba congelata
spedita dal continente.

Original:
Interact with the \C[1]Globe\C[0] to
travel to the world map.
it:
Interagisci con il \C[1]Globo\C[0] per
viaggiare sulla mappa del mondo.

Original:
Be careful: since the Y2K event,
the world is a mess.
it:
Fai attenzione: da quando c’è stato l’evento Y2K,
il mondo è un casino.

Original:
There are roaming monsters even
more dangerous of the ones you
will find in the Omega Tower.
it:
Ci sono mostri in giro ancora più pericolosi
di quelli che troverai nella Torre Omega.

Original:
Just use the Hypermetro like any
sane human being ok?
it:
Usa l’Hypermetro come ogni
essere umano sano di mente, ok?

Original:
\c[1]STR\c[0] is your Strength.
It determines the damage of physical
attacks and skills.

\c[1]CON\c[0] is your Constitution.
It determines your physical defenses
and how much you can carry.

\c[1]INT\c[0] is your Intelligence.
It determines the damage of magical
attacks.

\c[1]WIS\c[0] is your Wisdom.
It determines your magical defenses.

\c[1]DEX\c[0] is your Dexterity.
It determines your turn speed.

\c[1]PSI\c[0] is your Psionics.
It determines your starting AP in
battle and your AP recovery.
It also influences Psionic skills.

You can access the \C[1]Tech tree\C[0]
in the menu or by interacting with this board.

Use materials to unlock permanents
upgrades to your stats, at higher
ranks you will need the help of
a team of researchers to advance.

This is pretty self-explanatory...
I'm so imbararassed to give you this 
explanation but here we are.

Put someting on the switch to 
activate it.
I know is the simplest puzzle
ever conceivable, but my job is

to explain how it works.
Interact with movable things to
move them, or just kick them with \c[1]C\c[0]

Let me talk to you about \C[1]Worthiness\C[0] and
some heavy stuff ok?
it:
Lascia che ti parli di \C[1]Meritevolezza\C[0] e 
di roba pesante, ok?

Original:
The Omega Tower elevator is sentient somehow and
can take likings to certain people who 
prove their worth.
it:
L’ascensore della Torre Omega è senziente in 
qualche modo e simpatizza con certe
 Persone che dimostrano il loro valore.

Original:
It will refuse to move to a floor that your
Party has not reached yet, and sometimes if he
judges you worthy enough will show only for you
it:
Rifiuterà di portarti a un piano che il tuo gruppo 
non ha ancora raggiunto, e a volte, se ti ritiene degno,
ti mostrerà

Original:
"Phantom floors" that exist only for a brief time.
By studying it we recently discovered a hidden
inheritance system: \c[1]Worthiness\c[0] can

be inherithed via a legally binding contract.
This is why back on the train you used to
get there we made you sign so many papers:

we already choosen your successor that will take
your place if you happen to die in the Tower.

Other than /c[1]Worthiness/c[0], also /c[2]Stocks/c[0]
and /c[3]Real estate/c[0] will be inherithed by
your successor, to regain your loot he must find
your body and desacrate the grave,

Pretty buro-metal but that is just how things
works in the Tower under the Archive Foundation.

Before we took control it was pure anarchy, a
simulacrum of the Tower of Babel.

The difference now is that we are using this tower
to study the decaying corpse of God.

Yes it's true, not a conspiracy theory:
The Abramitic God was murdered last year in a 
elaborate ritual named "The Solomon Ritual"

It was conducted by the 3 pillars of the 
Mages Guild: Lady Margareth, Sir Alesteir 
Crowley and The Father.

They used a young wannabe witch as a living
teonuclear weapon: they turned her memories into
a colossal God slaying mecha of pure light that

pierced God's heart and disintegrated his soul
in quadrillions of pieces, leaving his bloated
body to orbit around Earth.

It also flattened my hometown in the process but
that's another story.

We could just launch a space shuttle filled with
scientists and theologists to land on God and
start taking samples...

But since the Y2K event, 
space travel is impracticable.

It's the Kessler Syndrome: a chain reaction
first started by the ENVISAT satellite.

Everything we put in orbit get shredded by
debris and get added to the chain reaction.

Sometimes also the cadaver of God get
shredded by the debris and they fall on Earth,
looking like mesmerizing comets.

How do i know about all these things?
This is the Archive Foundation.

We collect everything, even state secrets
and liberate the informations.

It's ok, is not really your problem because the
Archive Foundation will take care of your porfolio
after you die.

You signed away basically all
your inheritance rights do you remember?

\C[1]Skills\C[0] are grouped in two 
main categories: \C[2]Abilities\C[0] and \C[3]Magic\C[0]

\C[1]Abilities\C[0] uses AP that are
gained on each turn based on 
your \C[3]PSI\C[0] stat

\C[2]Magic\C[0] uses MP, there are
also hybrid abilities that uses
both MP and AP.

Use the \I[38]\C[1]Thinker\C[0] option in
the menu to start crafting and
disassembling items.

Every item needs a certain amount
of materials to be crafted.
The rarer the item the higher the amount
of materials needed.

You can also disassemble items you
no longer use to obtain some materials.

To collect materials slay monsters and
examine every nook and cranny of the world!

Use the\C[1]Computer\C[0] to
access the Hypernet, view the 
Stock market and many other 
marvelous things.

When investing remember this: \C[1]OIL\C[0]
is a extremely volatile stock,
\C[2]SOUL\C[0] is more stable but the value
can change based on current news.

\C[2]SOUL\C[0] price directly influence
the tariff on imported goods ordered
online.

The Omega Tower is designed by the
European Commission as a neutral zone
between the Hyperpowers and we get so
many combined tariffs!

Back to the explanation: when you have
ammassed a large amount of capital
you can try investing in \c[3]Real estate\c[0].

Buy properties around Europe and get
tenants that will pay a daily rent.
Price and attractiveness is influenced
by local news on the city you bought property.

During battle you can sever or destroy
the limbs of a enemy, affecting their stats.

If you sever a vital part of a enemy
during battle it will die in one hit.

Some enemies have multiple vital parts, such
as Hydras and double headed enemies.

You are also composed of squishy organs!
Enemy attacks can break your bones and
puncture your internal organs.

Check the \I[34]\C[1]Health Status\C[0] option
in menu do to a self check of you all body parts.

If you have too many broken parts
your stats will be reduced to a point
where you are useless in battle.

Be sure to heal them, rest or
visit a doctor before you die for real!

Check the blackboard to learn
about states, there are too many
to even begin remembering them...

Select \I[140]\c[1]Cooking\c[0] from main menu to
start cooking delicious meals for your party!

Just pick two ingredients at random: since
the Y2K event we lost all online recipes so
we need to start from the stone age of cooking.

Ever tried a Kebab Bolognese or some
Pinapple Krauts? You can also throw healing
items and drugs in the mix, you mileage may vary!

Check the \I[96] icon in the pause menu
to see how hungry you and your party is.

You can learn new skills by going in
the \I[34]\C[1]Training\C[0] of the main menu.

Skills that your class is proficient on
will have a learning speed bonus: 
\c[1]Primary skills\c[0] have a 4x bonus
and \c[1]Secondary skills\c[0] have a 2x bonus.

You can also learn skills outside your
class specialization but the learning
process will at nornal speed.

Find trainers and fight monsters to gain
experience in the currently trained skill.

Getting a lil' sleepy while deep into the Omega
Tower can be a death sentence, be sure to rest
regularly.

Find inns and beds to get a full rest, you can
also buy camp equipment to set up your camp.

The safest option is to sleep in the camp we set
in the elevator: monsters are repelled by the 
presence of the elevator and is the only reason
the Tower's base floor is not flooded with monsters.

You can also restore some sleep by drinking 
coffee or using stimulants and combat drugs.

Also...if you happen to become undead you will
no longer need to sleep.

Check the \I[66] icon in the pause menu
to see how sleepy you are.

Don't worry about me, i'll just watch you
ween you sleep :)

You can learn new skills by going in
the \C[1]Training\C[0] of the main menu.
Whoa! That's great i also love fishing!

Do you happen also to like...cocaine?
Don't worry it's in a legal gray area
at the Omega Tower, not right out
illegal!
Get out of my hut right now.

Use \C[1]Target\C[0] in battle to check the
elemental weaknesses of a enemy.

Both magic and physical attacks can inflict
elemental damage, there are also some classes like
the Nun that will inflict always Holy damage.

Just remember this: if a companion falls in battle
you have until the battle end to try to stabilize
and revive him.
Nun beer six pack was found!

Do you really want to retire from adventuring
and return home?

We call this place Omega Tower
No one's quite sure what it used to be.
it:
Chiamiamo questo posto Torre Omega.
Nessuno sa davvero cosa fosse un tempo.

Original:
It’s massive: it extends into the clouds and 
burrows deep down into the bowels of earth.
it:
È immensa: si estende tra le nuvole e
Scava nelle viscere della terra.

Original:
Most likely a failed arcology project built 
on anomalous and thaumaturgical principles.
it:
Probabilmente un progetto fallito di arcologia,
basato su principi anomali e taumaturgici.

Original:
We've deployed probes for over a
thousand floors in both directions. 
No confirmed top...or bottom.
it:
Abbiamo inviato sonde per oltre
mille piani in entrambe le direzioni.
Nessuna cima confermata… né fondo.

Original:
The entrance is at the Hypernet Point. 
Take the elevator to Floor 0 then go to the
door to the left.
it:
L’ingresso è al Punto Hypernet.
Prendi l’ascensore fino al Piano 0, poi vai
alla porta sulla sinistra.

Original:
Once inside take the big central staircase
and you can start exploring freely, just 
remember to stock up before an expedition.
it:
Una volta dentro prendi la grande scala centrale
e potrai iniziare a esplorare liberamente,
ricorda solo di fare scorte prima di una spedizione.

Original: Do you want me to take you there?
en: Do you want me to take you there?

Original:
Like everywere in the tower!
Almost every person here is a
Some of them are willing to team up if your goals align.
en: Some of them are willing to team up if your goals align.
it:
Alcuni di loro sono disposti a fare squadra se i
vostri obiettivi coincidono.

Original:
Sometimes, when you’re exploring a floor or returning 
to base, you’ll run into other explorers and archivists.
it:
A volte, mentre esplori un piano o ritorni
alla base, incontrerai altri esploratori e archivisti.

Original:
If you want allies, talk to people around here. 
Share what you’ve found. 
They’re more likely to trust someone who actually
contributes to the Archive.
it:
Se vuoi degli alleati, parla con chi ti sta intorno.
Condividi ciò che hai scoperto.
È più probabile che si fidino di chi
contribuisce davvero all’Archivio.

Original:
Maybe even self-aware, though it won’t say
anything directly.
it:
Forse è persino autocosciente, anche se
non dirà mai nulla apertamente.

Original:
Here’s the tricky part. The elevator won’t take you
somewhere you haven’t been on foot.
it:
Ecco la parte complicata. L’ascensore non ti 
Porterà in un piano dove non sei già stato a piedi.

Original:
If you want to reach a floor via elevator, 
you’ve got to earn it first.
it:
Se vuoi raggiungere un piano con l’ascensore,
devi prima meritartelo.

Original:
Strangely enough, a few high floors are unlocked right 
from the start. No one knows why. 
Might be just a design feature or it just wants to show off.
it:
Stranamente, alcuni piani alti sono sbloccati
fin dall’inizio. Nessuno sa perché.
Forse è una scelta di design, o vuole solo fare il figo.

Original:
It's a neolanguage based on the deconstruction
and recostruction of English,
it:
È una neolingua basata sulla decostruzione
e ricostruzione dell’italiano,

Original: The Hypernet isn’t what it used to be.
en: The Hypernet isn’t what it used to be.
it: L’Hypernet non è più quello di una volta

Original:
It was destroyed during the Y2K Event, 
when something—something not from here—breached 
into our layer of reality. We call it Omni-Lex.
it:
È stato distrutto durante l’evento Y2K,
quando qualcosa—qualcosa che non viene da qui—ha violato
il nostro livello di realtà. Lo chiamiamo Omni-Lex.

Original:
An extradimensional intelligence that decrypted 
every password, breached every firewall, 
and made everything public.
it:
Un’intelligenza extradimensionale che ha decifrato
ogni password, abbattuto ogni firewall
e reso tutto pubblico.

Original: The Hypernet couldn’t survive full transparency.
en: The Hypernet couldn’t survive full transparency.
it:
L’Iperrete non poteva sopravvivere alla piena
trasparenza.

Original:
In the aftermath, the Foundation did what 
it always does—salvage and rebuild.
it:
Dopo il disastro, la Fondazione ha fatto
quello che fa sempre: recuperare e ricostruire.

Original:
What’s left of the Hypernet now is fragile, patchy, 
and deeply weird. We’re trying to reconstruct 
it from recovered HTML files, old hard drives, 
forgotten caches.
it:
Quello che resta dell’Hypernet oggi è fragile, incompleto
e profondamente strano. Stiamo cercando di ricostruirlo
da file HTML recuperati, vecchi hard disk,
cache dimenticate.

Original:
Most links are broken. Images are missing. 
HexScript's practically radioactive. But sometimes, 
buried in the markup, we find data worth keeping.
it:
La maggior parte dei link è rotta. Le immagini sono sparite.
HexScript è praticamente radioattivo. Ma a volte,
nascosti nel codice, troviamo dati che valgono la pena.

Original:
You’ll be browsing fragments and static pages once 
hosted by people long gone.
it:
Sfoglierai frammenti e pagine statiche
che un tempo erano ospitate da persone ormai scomparse.

Original:
Yound the remains of an adventurer, what do you want
to do?
Uses a random skill from the enemy or party
en: Uses a random skill from the enemy or party

en: The life link with %1 is severed.
it: Il legame vitale con %1 è reciso.

Original: The curse of vulnerability persists on %1...
en: The curse of vulnerability persists on %1...
it: La maledizione della vulnerabilità persiste su %1...

Original: The vulnerability curse on %1 is lifted.
en: The vulnerability curse on %1 is lifted.
it: La maledizione della vulnerabilità su %1 è stata revocata.

Original: Which file would you like to save to?
en: Which file would you like to save to?

Original: Which file would you like to load?
en: Which file would you like to load?

it: %1 ha attaccato per prim* con sicurezza!
%1 è stat* vittima di un’imboscata dalle ombre in agguato!
%1 ha gestito la situazione alla perfezione.
Il livello di %1 è salito a %3!
%1 ha schivato come un professionista - mancato!

Original:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you should flee before
anybody get hurt.
en:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you should flee before
anybody get hurt.
it:
Se incontri un nemico di livello alto che può
uccidere te e i tuoi amici con un colpo solo,
dovresti fuggire prima che qualcuno si faccia
male.

Original:
We call this place Tower-0. 
No one's quite sure what it used to be.
en:
We call this place Tower-0. 
No one's quite sure what it used to be.

Original:
It's massive—stretches up into the 
clouds and all the way down into the earth.
en:
It's massive—stretches up into the 
clouds and all the way down into the earth.
it:
È enorme—si estende su fino alle nuvole e giù fino
nelle profondità della terra.

Original:
We've sent probes down over a
thousands floors and still haven’t found bottom...or the 
top.
en:
We've sent probes down over a
thousands floors and still haven’t found bottom...or the 
top.
it:
Abbiamo mandato sonde per migliaia di piani e non
abbiamo ancora trovato né il fondo... né la cima.

Original:
Maybe even self-aware, though it won’t say
anything directly.
en:
Maybe even self-aware, though it won’t say
anything directly.
it:
Magari persino autocosciente, anche se non ti dirà
nulla in modo diretto.

Original:
There’s a door every 20 floors, sometimes functional, 
sometimes just concrete.
en:
There’s a door every 20 floors, sometimes functional, 
sometimes just concrete.
it:
C’è una porta ogni 20 piani, a volte funzionante,
a volte solo cemento.

Original:
You’ll hit those on the 20s, 40s, 60s, etc. 
It can take you up, or bring you back to ground 
level, if it likes you.
en:
You’ll hit those on the 20s, 40s, 60s, etc. 
It can take you up, or bring you back to ground 
level, if it likes you.
it:
Le troverai ai piani 20, 40, 60, ecc. Può portarti
in alto o riportarti al piano terra, se gli piaci.

Original:
Here’s the tricky part. The elevator won’t take you
somewhere you haven’t been on foot.
en:
Here’s the tricky part. The elevator won’t take you
somewhere you haven’t been on foot.
it:
Ecco la parte difficile. L’ascensore non ti
porterà in un posto dove non sei già stato a
piedi.

Original:
If you want to reach a floor via elevator, 
you’ve got to earn it first.
en:
If you want to reach a floor via elevator, 
you’ve got to earn it first.
it:
Se vuoi raggiungere un piano con l’ascensore, devi
meritartelo prima.

Original:
Strangely enough, a few high floors are unlocked right 
from the start. No one knows why. 
Might be just a design feature or it just wants to show off.
en:
Strangely enough, a few high floors are unlocked right 
from the start. No one knows why. 
Might be just a design feature or it just wants to show off.
it:
Stranamente, alcuni piani alti sono sbloccati fin
dall’inizio. Nessuno sa perché. Potrebbe essere
solo una scelta di design o vuole mettersi in
mostra.

Original:
Sometimes, when you’re exploring a floor or returning 
to base, you’ll run into other explorers and archivists.
en:
Sometimes, when you’re exploring a floor or returning 
to base, you’ll run into other explorers and archivists.
it:
A volte, mentre esplori un piano o torni alla
base, incontrerai altri esploratori e archivisti.

Original:
If you want allies, talk to people around here. 
Share what you’ve found. 
They’re more likely to trust someone who actually
contributes to the Archive.
en:
If you want allies, talk to people around here. 
Share what you’ve found. 
They’re more likely to trust someone who actually
contributes to the Archive.
it:
Se vuoi alleati, parla con la gente qui intorno.
condividi quello che hai trovato. È più facile che
si fidino di qualcuno che contribuisce davvero
all’Archivio.

Original:
It was destroyed during the Y2K Event, 
when something—something not from here—breached 
into our layer of reality. We call it Omni-Lex.
en:
It was destroyed during the Y2K Event, 
when something—something not from here—breached 
into our layer of reality. We call it Omni-Lex.
it:
Fu distrutta durante l’Evento Y2K, quando
qualcosa—qualcosa che non viene da qui—violò il
nostro strato di realtà. Lo chiamiamo omni-Lex.

Original:
An extradimensional intelligence that decrypted 
every password, breached every firewall, 
and made everything public.
en:
An extradimensional intelligence that decrypted 
every password, breached every firewall, 
and made everything public.
it:
Un’intelligenza extradimensionale che decifrò ogni
password, superò ogni firewall e rese tutto
pubblico.

Original:
In the aftermath, the Foundation did what 
it always does—salvage and rebuild.
en:
In the aftermath, the Foundation did what 
it always does—salvage and rebuild.
it:
Dopo il disastro, la Fondazione fece quello che fa
sempre: recuperare e ricostruire.

Original:
What’s left of the Hypernet now is fragile, patchy, 
and deeply weird. We’re trying to reconstruct 
it from recovered HTML files, old hard drives, 
forgotten caches.
en:
What’s left of the Hypernet now is fragile, patchy, 
and deeply weird. We’re trying to reconstruct 
it from recovered HTML files, old hard drives, 
forgotten caches.
it:
Quello che resta oggi dell’Iperrete è fragile,
frammentato e davvero strano. Stiamo cercando di
ricostruirlo da file HTML recuperati, vecchi hard
disk e cache dimenticate.

Original:
Most links are broken. Images are missing. 
HexScript's practically radioactive. But sometimes, 
buried in the markup, we find data worth keeping.
en:
Most links are broken. Images are missing. 
HexScript's practically radioactive. But sometimes, 
buried in the markup, we find data worth keeping.
it:
La maggior parte dei link è rotta. Le immagini
mancano. HexScript è praticamente radioattivo. Ma
a volte, sepolti nel markup, troviamo dati che
vale la pena conservare.

Original:
You’ll be browsing fragments and static pages once 
hosted by people long gone.
en:
You’ll be browsing fragments and static pages once 
hosted by people long gone.
it:
Navigherai tra frammenti e pagine statiche un
tempo ospitate da persone ormai scomparse.

Original:
Change class? You will return at LV.1 but keep all
your skills
en:
Change class? You will return at LV.1 but keep all
your skills
it:
Cambiare classe? Tornerai al LV.1 ma manterrai
tutte le tue abilità

Original:
Since you are under LV.10 you can change your class, but
you will forget all your skills.
You will also return to LV.1
en:
Since you are under LV.10 you can change your class, but
you will forget all your skills.
You will also return to LV.1
it:
Poiché sei sotto il LV.10 puoi cambiare classe, ma
dimenticherai tutte le tue abilità. Tornerai anche
al LV.1

Original:
The rest of the world is still a work in progress,
come back when the full game releases!
en:
The rest of the world is still a work in progress,
come back when the full game releases!
it:
Il resto del mondo è ancora in lavorazione, torna
quando il gioco sarà completo!

Original:
Didn't you know that there is a easier way to
get to the tower? Just take the Hypermetro!
en:
Didn't you know that there is a easier way to
get to the tower? Just take the Hypermetro!
it:
Non sapevi che c'è un modo più semplice per
raggiungere la torre? Prendi l'Hypermetro!

Original:
How did you manage to survive the arcane mist 
and stuff in the first place?
en:
How did you manage to survive the arcane mist 
and stuff in the first place?
it:
Come hai fatto a sopravvivere alla nebbia arcana e
a tutto il resto, in primo luogo?

Original:
I'm trying to make this tower self sufficient 
you know?
en:
I'm trying to make this tower self sufficient 
you know?
it:
Sto cercando di rendere questa torre
autosufficiente, sai?

Original:
The Hypermetro is the only lifeline
connecting this place to the rest of the world.
en:
The Hypermetro is the only lifeline
connecting this place to the rest of the world.
it:
L'Hypermetro è l'unica linea di comunicazione che
collega questo posto al resto del mondo.

Original:
But what happens if a PSIterrorist dedices to
blow up the tunnels? We will be all starve to death
or be forced to eat monsters that lives in
upper floors
en:
But what happens if a PSIterrorist dedices to
blow up the tunnels? We will be all starve to death
or be forced to eat monsters that lives in
upper floors
it:
Ma cosa succede se un terrorista psichico decide
di far saltare in aria i tunnel? moriremo tutti di
fame o saremo costretti a mangiare i mostri che
vivono nei piani superiori.

Original:
Through the arcane neurotoxic mist and stuff?
You must be serious about this.
en:
Through the arcane neurotoxic mist and stuff?
You must be serious about this.
it:
Attraverso l'arcana nebbia neurotossica e roba del
genere? Devi fare sul serio.

Original:
Let me explain to you the situation:
We're currently stationed inside an *anomalous skyscraper*
en:
Let me explain to you the situation:
We're currently stationed inside an *anomalous skyscraper*
it:
Vi spiego la situazione: Al momento siamo di
stanza all'interno di un *grattacielo anomalo*.

Original:
Our job is to explore, document, and archive everything
we find and we’re actively recruiting explorers and
freelancers.
en:
Our job is to explore, document, and archive everything
we find and we’re actively recruiting explorers and
freelancers.
it:
Il nostro lavoro è esplorare, documentare e
archiviare tutto ciò che troviamo e stiamo
reclutando attivamente esploratori e freelance.

Original:
When you're stocked up and feel ready, 
you can begin exploring by going to the Hypernet
point upstairs
en:
When you're stocked up and feel ready, 
you can begin exploring by going to the Hypernet
point upstairs
it:
Quando avrai fatto rifornimento e ti sentirai
pronto, potrai iniziare l'esplorazione recandoti
al piano superiore

Original:
Be warned, though—each floor above us follows its own rules. 
Gravity gets weird, logic bends in weird ways, 
and time itself may lose its grip.
en:
Be warned, though—each floor above us follows its own rules. 
Gravity gets weird, logic bends in weird ways, 
and time itself may lose its grip.
it:
Attenzione, però: ogni piano sopra di noi segue le
sue regole. La gravità diventa strana, la logica
si piega in modi bizzarri e il tempo stesso
potrebbe perdere la sua presa.

Original:
This experience is not what you think it is. 
Long forgotten a shadow, will never bring light.
en:
This experience is not what you think it is. 
Long forgotten a shadow, will never bring light.
it:
Questa esperienza non è come pensi. Un'ombra
dimenticata da tempo, non porterà mai la luce.

Original:
Every month, the moon descends to earth and sits atop the
temple roof
She bleeds milk and worms.
en:
Every month, the moon descends to earth and sits atop the
temple roof
She bleeds milk and worms.

Original:
The village cats line up to lick it, hoping for sweet dreams.
One night, one of them dares to ask her, 'Do you dream, moon?'
en:
The village cats line up to lick it, hoping for sweet dreams.
One night, one of them dares to ask her, 'Do you dream, moon?'

Original:
She crushes him with a giant foot she didn’t have before.
'Yes,' she says. 'I dream that none of you exist anymore.'
en:
She crushes him with a giant foot she didn’t have before.
'Yes,' she says. 'I dream that none of you exist anymore.'

Original:
...And that’s just how life was in my village, out in the 
Free States of the Americas."
en:
...And that’s just how life was in my village, out in the 
Free States of the Americas."

Original:
Hello \N[1] i'm Selene from HQ!
Welcome to the Omega Tower!
en:
Hello \N[1] i'm Selene from HR!
Welcome to the Omega Tower!
it:
Ciao \N[1]! Sono Selene delle risorse umane!
Benvenuto nella Torre Omega!

Original:
Here is your free starting kit, just 
like it was promised in the promo pamphlet!
en:
Here is your free starting kit, just 
like it was promised in the promo pamphlet!
it:
Ecco il tuo kit iniziale gratuito,
proprio come promesso nel volantino promozionale!

Original:
You’ll find weapons, clothes, trinkets and
thamaturgical stuff we’ve put together for new recruits.
en:
You’ll find weapons, clothes, trinkets and
thamaturgical stuff we’ve put together for new recruits.
it:
Troverai armi, vestiti, cianfrusaglie
e roba taumaturgica che abbiamo preparato 
Per le nuove reclute.

Original:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you can always flee at the
first turn without taking damage.
en:
If you come across a high level that can one-shot
you and your friends, you can always flee at the
first turn without taking damage.
it:
Se ti imbatti in un livello alto che può uccidere
te e i tuoi amici con un colpo solo, puoi sempre
fuggire al primo turno senza subire danni.

Original:
You can select a new skill to train
in the training menu, win battles to gain
learning points.
en:
You can select a new skill to train
in the training menu, win battles to gain
learning points.
it:
Puoi selezionare una nuova abilità da allenare nel
menu di allenamento e vincere battaglie per
ottenere punti apprendimento.

Original:
...or you can just buy a online course online
that will teach you that skill or spell, but they
are pretty pricey.
en:
...or you can just buy a online course online
that will teach you that skill or spell, but they
are pretty pricey.
it:
...oppure puoi semplicemente acquistare un corso
online che ti insegnerà quell'abilità o
quell'incantesimo, ma sono piuttosto costosi.

Original:
You absorbed the creature.
You are now just like them,
en:
You absorbed the creature.
You are now just like them,
it:
Hai assorbito la creatura. Ora sei proprio come
loro,

Original:
In \C[1]Permadeath mode\C[0] if your character perish in battle
you will have to create a new one.
Loot the body of your past character to recover items and
euros.
en:
In \C[1]Permadeath mode\C[0] if your character perish in battle
you will have to create a new one.
Loot the body of your past character to recover items and
euros.

Original:
In \C[1]Standard mode\C[0] if your character get defeated
during battle will rewake at the base floor of the dungeon.
Your allies will still die if they are not resurrected
by the end of the battle.
en:
In \C[1]Standard mode\C[0] if your character get defeated
during battle will rewake at the base floor of the dungeon.
Your allies will still die if they are not resurrected
by the end of the battle.

Original:
Do you really want to retire from adventuring
and return home?
en:
Do you really want to retire from adventuring
and return home?
it:
Vuoi davvero ritirarti dalla vita da avventuriero
e tornare a casa?

Original:
We call this place Omega Tower
No one's quite sure what it used to be.
en:
We call this place Omega Tower
No one's quite sure what it used to be.

Original:
It’s massive: it extends into the clouds and 
burrows deep down into the bowels of earth.
en:
It’s massive: it extends into the clouds and 
burrows deep down into the bowels of earth.

Original:
Most likely a failed arcology project built 
on anomalous and thaumaturgical principles.
en:
Most likely a failed arcology project built 
on anomalous and thaumaturgical principles.

Original:
We've deployed probes for over a
thousand floors in both directions. 
No confirmed top...or bottom.
en:
We've deployed probes for over a
thousand floors in both directions. 
No confirmed top...or bottom.

Original:
The entrance is at the Hypernet Point. 
Take the elevator to Floor 0 then go to the
door to the left.
en:
The entrance is at the Hypernet Point. 
Take the elevator to Floor 0 then go to the
door to the left.

Original:
Once inside take the big central staircase
and you can start exploring freely, just 
remember to stock up before an expedition.
en:
Once inside take the big central staircase
and you can start exploring freely, just 
remember to stock up before an expedition.

Original:
Like everywere in the tower!
Almost every person here is a
en:
Like everywere in the tower!
Almost every person here is a

Original:
It's a neolanguage based on the deconstruction
and recostruction of English,
en:
It's a neolanguage based on the deconstruction
and recostruction of English,

Original:
Yound the remains of an adventurer, what do you want
to do?
en:
Yound the remains of an adventurer, what do you want
to do?

Original:
Performs a series of attacks
on an enemy.
en:
Performs a series of attacks
on an enemy.
it: Esegue una serie di attacchi contro un nemico.

Original:
Performs a double attack on a
random enemy.
en:
Performs a double attack on a
random enemy.
it: Esegue un doppio attacco su un nemico.

Original:
Performs a triple attack on a
random enemy.
en:
Performs a triple attack on a
random enemy.
it: Esegue un triplo attacco su un nemico a caso.

Original:
Stabs an enemy with paralyzing
needles.
en:
Stabs an enemy with paralyzing
needles.
it: Trafigge un nemico Con aghi paralizzanti.

Original:
Inflicts damage and causes
an enemy to lose balance.
en:
Inflicts damage and causes
an enemy to lose balance.
it:
Infligge danni e fa Perdere l'equilibrio al
nemico.

Original:
Inflicts Thunder-type damage
and Paralysis state.
en:
Inflicts Thunder-type damage
and Paralysis state.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Tuono e Paralisi.

Original:
Covers an enemy in
slime and lowers their DEX.
en:
Covers an enemy in
slime and lowers their DEX.
it: Ricopre un nemico di Melma e ne riduce la dES.

Original:
Sprays an enemy with
venom and inflicts poison state.
en:
Sprays an enemy with
venom and inflicts poison state.
it: Spruzza veleno su un Nemico e lo avvelena

Original:
Rouses the user’s fighting spirit and fortifies
their abilities.
en:
Rouses the user’s fighting spirit and fortifies
their abilities.

Original:
Glares at an enemy and
paralyzes them.
en:
Glares at an enemy and
paralyzes them.
it: Squadra un nemico e lo paralizza.

Original:
A quick jab aimed at an enemy's eyes, 
potentially causing blindness.
en:
A quick jab aimed at an enemy's eyes, 
potentially causing blindness.
it:
Un rapido colpo mirato agli occhi del nemico, che
può causare cecità.

Original:
Inflicts Earth-type damage
on all enemies.
en:
Inflicts Earth-type damage
on all enemies.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Metallo a tutti i nemici.

Original:
Inflicts Wind-type damage
on all enemies.
en:
Inflicts Wind-type damage
on all enemies.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Vento a tutti i nemici.

Original:
Inflicts Fire-type damage
on all enemies.
en:
Inflicts Fire-type damage
on all enemies.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Fuoco A tutti i nemici.

Original:
Inflicts Ice-type damage
on all enemies.
en:
Inflicts Ice-type damage
on all enemies.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Ghiaccio A tutti i nemici.

Original:
Stomps the ground and inflict Metal-type
damage to all enemies.
en:
Stomps the ground and inflict Metal-type
damage to all enemies.
it:
Calpesta il terreno e infligge danni Di tipo
metallo a tutti i nemici.

Original:
Inflicts Water-type damage
on all enemies.
en:
Inflicts Water-type damage
on all enemies.
it: Infligge danni di tipo Acqua a tutti i nemici.

Original:
A rapid punching technique that
strikes the enemy multiple times.
en:
A rapid punching technique that
strikes the enemy multiple times.
it:
Una tecnica di pugno rapido che colpisce il nemico
più volte.

Original:
A powerful overhead throw technique that
slams the enemy to the ground.
en:
A powerful overhead throw technique that
slams the enemy to the ground.
it:
Una potente tecnica di lancio sopra la testa che
scaglia il nemico a terra.

Original:
A precise strike targeting the
enemy's pressure points, may cause paralysis.
en:
A precise strike targeting the
enemy's pressure points, may cause paralysis.
it:
Un colpo preciso che colpisca i punti Di pressione
del nemico può causare paralisi.

Original:
A grappling technique that holds the
enemy in place and gradually drains HP.
en:
A grappling technique that holds the
enemy in place and gradually drains HP.
it:
Una tecnica di presa che mantiene fermo Il nemico
e ne consuma gradualmente gli HP.

Original:
A devastating spinning kick
that targets all enemies.
en:
A devastating spinning kick
that targets all enemies.
it:
Un calcio rotante devastante che colpisce tutti i
nemici.

Original:
A defensive stance that increases PSI
and counter rate for 3 turns.
en:
A defensive stance that increases PSI
and counter rate for 3 turns.
it:
Una posizione difensiva che aumenta PSI e il
contrattacco per 3 turni.

Original:
A meditation technique that restores the
user's HP and clears negative status effects.
en:
A meditation technique that restores the
user's HP and clears negative status effects.
it:
Una tecnica di meditazione che ripristina gli hP e
cancella gli effetti di stato negativi.

Original:
Drops the enemyon their head,
may cause instant KO.
en:
Drops the enemyon their head,
may cause instant KO.
it:
Fa cadere il nemico a testa in giù, può causare KO
immediato.

Original:
A rapid series of kicks
that hits all enemies multiple times.
en:
A rapid series of kicks
that hits all enemies multiple times.
it:
Una rapida serie di calci che colpisce tutti i
nemici più volte.

Original:
The ultimate martial arts technique that
unleashes devastating damage the enemy.
en:
The ultimate martial arts technique that
unleashes devastating damage the enemy.
it:
La tecnica definitiva di arti marziali che
infligge danni devastanti al nemico.

Original:
A confusing martial dance
that leaves enemies disoriented.
en:
A confusing martial dance
that leaves enemies disoriented.
it:
Una danza marziale confusa che disorienta i
nemici.

Original:
Focuses inner energy to dramatically increase
Attack and Critical Rate for 3 turns.
en:
Focuses inner energy to dramatically increase
Attack and Critical Rate for 3 turns.
it:
Concentra l'energia interiore per aumentare
drasticamente ATK e critico per 3 turni.

Original:
A wrestling move that slams the
enemy into the ground multiple times.
en:
A wrestling move that slams the
enemy into the ground multiple times.
it:
Una mossa di wrestling che Sbatte il nemico a
terra più volte.

Original:
A lightning-fast palm strike
that may paralyze the enemy.
en:
A lightning-fast palm strike
that may paralyze the enemy.
it:
Un colpo di palmo fulmineo che può paralizzare il
nemico.

Original:
A powerful upward kick that
launches enemies into the air.
en:
A powerful upward kick that
launches enemies into the air.
it:
Un potente calcio verso l'alto che scaglia i
nemici in aria.

Original:
A wrestling move that catches the
enemy in a painful leg lock.
en:
A wrestling move that catches the
enemy in a painful leg lock.
it:
Una mossa di wrestling che blocca il nemico in una
dolorosa presa alla gamba.

Original:
A wrestling move that hits the
enemy with a chair. Ignores some COS.
en:
A wrestling move that hits the
enemy with a chair. Ignores some COS.
it:
Colpisci il nemico con una sedia. Ignora un po’ di
cOS.

Original:
A martial arts technique that
increases PSI dramatically for 3 turns.
en:
A martial arts technique that
increases PSI dramatically for 3 turns.
it:
Una tecnica di arti marziali che aumenta
drasticamente PSI per 3 turni.

Original:
A lethal martial arts technique that focuses
all energy into a single devastating strike.
en:
A lethal martial arts technique that focuses
all energy into a single devastating strike.
it:
Una tecnica che concentra tutta l'energia in un
unico colpo devastante.

Original:
A martial arts counterstrike that activates
when attacked, with increased critical chance.
en:
A martial arts counterstrike that activates
when attacked, with increased critical chance.
it:
Un contrattacco di arti marziali Con maggiori
probabilità di colpo critico.

Original:
A grappling technique that breaks the
enemy's guard and reduces their COS.
en:
A grappling technique that breaks the

Utilizza tecniche di disturbo mentale per ridurre

Una furiosa frenesia di attacchi quando si è alle

L'attacco bestiale definitivo che infligge danni

is manipulated in the caster's favor.
it:
Crea un campo in cui la probabilità stessa viene
manipolata a favore di chi lancia l'incantesimo.

Original:
Summons a liquid that flows
against gravity and dissolves reality.
en:
Summons a liquid that flows
against gravity and dissolves reality.
it:
Evoca un liquido che scorre contro la gravità e
dissolve la realtà.

Original:
Speaks in a language that reality
itself cannot comprehend.
en:
Speaks in a language that reality
itself cannot comprehend.
it:
Parla in una lingua che la realtà stessa non può
comprendere.

Original:
Drains concepts and ideas from the
target's mind.
en:
Drains concepts and ideas from the
target's mind.
it:
Prosciuga concetti e idee dalla mente del
bersaglio.

Original:
Temporarily transforms the target
into a bizarre, non-functional form.
en:
Temporarily transforms the target
into a bizarre, non-functional form.
it:
Trasforma temporaneamente il bersaglio in una
forma bizzarra e non funzionale.

Original:
Creates a whirling vortex of impossible
colors that damage the mind and body.
en:
Creates a whirling vortex of impossible
colors that damage the mind and body.
it:
Crea un vortice vorticoso di colori impossibili
che danneggiano la mente e il corpo.

Original:
Plunges the target into a dream within a
dream, causing deep sleep and confusion upon waking.
en:
Plunges the target into a dream within a
dream, causing deep sleep and confusion upon waking.
it:
Immerge il bersaglio in un sogno dentro un sogno,
causandogli un sonno profondo e confusione al
risveglio.

Original:
Causes the target to experience their
own death in all possible timelines simultaneously.
en:
Causes the target to experience their
own death in all possible timelines simultaneously.
it:
Fa sì che il bersaglio sperimenti la propria morte
in tutte le possibili linee temporali
simultaneamente.

Original:
Creates a paradoxical loop in
time that confuses and traps enemies.
en:
Creates a paradoxical loop in
time that confuses and traps enemies.
it:
Crea un ciclo temporale paradossale che confonde e
intrappola i nemici.

Original:
Reverses the target's perceptions so they
see allies as enemies and vice versa.
en:
Reverses the target's perceptions so they
see allies as enemies and vice versa.
it:
Inverte la percezione del bersaglio in modo che
veda gli alleati come nemici e viceversa.

Original:
Summons an impossible entity from outside
reality that annihilates everything it touches.
en:
Summons an impossible entity from outside
reality that annihilates everything it touches.
it:
Evoca un'entità impossibile dalla realtà esterna
che annienta tutto ciò che tocca.

Original:
Causes the target to experience
being everywhere and nowhere simultaneously.
en:
Causes the target to experience
being everywhere and nowhere simultaneously.
it:
Fa sì che il bersaglio sperimenti l'essere ovunque
e in nessun luogo contemporaneamente.

Original:
Creates a cascading failure in the fabric
of reality, causing damage based on all stats.
en:
Creates a cascading failure in the fabric
of reality, causing damage based on all stats.
it:
Crea un fallimento a cascata nel tessuto della
realtà, causando danni basati su tutte le
statistiche.

Original:
Creates a tiny flame
that barely singes the target.
en:
Creates a tiny flame
that barely singes the target.
it:
Crea una piccola fiamma che brucia appena il
bersaglio.

Original:
Forms a single snowflake that
melts on contact with the target.
en:
Forms a single snowflake that
melts on contact with the target.
it:
Forma un singolo fiocco di neve che si scioglie al
contatto con il bersaglio.

Original:
Creates a small static shock
that barely affects the target.
en:
Creates a small static shock
that barely affects the target.
it:
Crea una piccola scossa statica che non ha quasi
alcun effetto sul bersaglio.

Original:
Conjures a few drops of
water that splash the target.
en:
Conjures a few drops of
water that splash the target.
it:
Evoca alcune gocce d'acqua che schizzano il
bersaglio.

Original:
Throws a tiny
pebble at the target.
en:
Throws a tiny
pebble at the target.
it: Lancia un piccolo sassolino al bersaglio.

Original:
Creates a small breeze that
barely moves the target's hair.
en:
Creates a small breeze that
barely moves the target's hair.
it:
Crea una leggera brezza che sposta appena i
capelli del bersaglio.

Original:
Creates a tiny sparkle of
light that's more pretty than damaging.
en:
Creates a tiny sparkle of
light that's more pretty than damaging.
it:
Crea un piccolo scintillio di luce che è più bello
che dannoso.

Original:
Creates a small shadow that
briefly passes over the target.
en:
Creates a small shadow that
briefly passes over the target.
it:
Crea una piccola ombra che sorvola brevemente il
bersaglio.

Original:
Heals a minuscule amount
of HP, barely noticeable.
en:
Heals a minuscule amount
of HP, barely noticeable.
it:
Recupera una quantità minuscola di HP, appena
percettibile.

Original:
Has a very small chance to
cure poison, but usually does nothing.
en:
Has a very small chance to
cure poison, but usually does nothing.
it:
Ha una probabilità molto bassa di curare il
veleno, ma di solito non fa nulla.

Original:
Slightly increases the target's Attack,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
en:
Slightly increases the target's Attack,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
it:
Aumenta leggermente FRZ del bersaglio, ma
l'effetto è appena percettibile.

Original:
Slightly increases the target's COS,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
en:
Slightly increases the target's COS,
but the effect is barely noticeable.
it:
Aumenta leggermente COS del bersaglio, ma
l'effetto è appena percettibile.

Original:
Attempts to decrease an enemy's
Attack, but the effect is minimal.
en:
Attempts to decrease an enemy's
Attack, but the effect is minimal.
it:
Tenta di ridurre l'attacco di un nemico, ma
l'effetto è minimo.

Original:
Drains a tiny amount
of HP from the target.
en:
Drains a tiny amount
of HP from the target.
it: Drena una piccola quantità di HP dal bersaglio.

Original:
Drains a minimal amount
of MP from the target.
en:
Drains a minimal amount
of MP from the target.
it: Consuma una quantità minima di MP dal bersaglio.

Original:
Creates a very minor magical
effect that deals minimal damage.
en:
Creates a very minor magical
effect that deals minimal damage.
it:
Crea un effetto magico molto lieve che infligge
danni minimi.

Original:
Attempts to imbue a weapon with
fire, but only makes it slightly warm.
en:
Attempts to imbue a weapon with
fire, but only makes it slightly warm.
it:
Tenta di infondere fuoco in un'arma, Ma la
riscalda solo leggermente.

Original:
Creates a light fog that
has no tactical advantage whatsoever.
en:
Creates a light fog that
has no tactical advantage whatsoever.
it:
Crea una leggera nebbia che non offre alcun
vantaggio tattico.

Original:
Makes the target see slightly
altered colors for a few seconds.
en:
Makes the target see slightly
altered colors for a few seconds.
it:
Fa sì che il bersaglio veda colori leggermente
alterati per alcuni secondi.

Original:
Creates a slightly pleasant melody
that has no combat effect.
en:
Creates a slightly pleasant melody
that has no combat effect.
it:
Crea una melodia leggermente piacevole che non ha
alcun effetto di combattimento.

Original:
A swift, precise stab targeting vital
areas with a blade or pointed weapon.
en:
A swift, precise stab targeting vital
areas with a blade or pointed weapon.
it:
Un colpo rapido e preciso che colpisce le zone
vitali con una lama o un'arma appuntita.

Original:
A powerful horizontal sweep
that can hit multiple enemies.
en:
A powerful horizontal sweep
that can hit multiple enemies.
it:
Una potente spazzata orizzontale che può colpire
più nemici.

Original:
A powerful downward strike
with full force behind it.
en:
A powerful downward strike
with full force behind it.
it:
Un potente colpo verso il basso con tutta la sua
forza.

Original:
Performs a flurry of quick
strikes that hit multiple times.
en:
Performs a flurry of quick
strikes that hit multiple times.
it:
Esegue una raffica di colpi rapidi che colpiscono
più volte.

Original:
A powerful upward strike
that can break through COS
en:
A powerful upward strike
that can break through COS
it: Un potente colpo verso l'alto che può sfondare COS

Original:
A precise strike targeting a
weak point in the enemy's COSs.
en:
A precise strike targeting a
weak point in the enemy's COSs.
it:
Un attacco preciso che colpisce un punto debole
nel COS nemico.

Original:
A spinning attack that
hits all enemies around you.
en:
A spinning attack that
hits all enemies around you.
it:
Un attacco rotante che colpisce tutti i nemici
intorno a te.

Original:
A brutal attack that can
cause bleeding damage over time.
en:
A brutal attack that can
cause bleeding damage over time.
it:
Un attacco brutale che può causare danni
emorragici nel tempo.

Original:
A crushing blow that slams
the enemy to the ground.
en:
A crushing blow that slams
the enemy to the ground.
it:
Un colpo devastante che scaraventa il nemico a
terra.

Original:
A sudden, lightning-fast strike
that's difficult to evade.
en:
A sudden, lightning-fast strike
that's difficult to evade.
it:
Un colpo improvviso, fulmineo, difficile da
evitare.

Original:
A series of rapid
thrusts with a pointed weapon.
en:
A series of rapid
thrusts with a pointed weapon.
it: Una serie di rapidi colpi con un'arma appuntita.

Original:
A heavy blow with the pommel or
hilt of a weapon, potentially stunning the target.
en:
A heavy blow with the pommel or
hilt of a weapon, potentially stunning the target.
it:
Un colpo violento con il pomolo o l'elsa di
un'arma, che può stordire il bersaglio.

Original:
A slash that targets the
legs to slow enemy movement.
en:
A slash that targets the
legs to slow enemy movement.
it:
Un fendente che colpisce le gambe Per rallentare i
movimenti del nemico.

Original:
A crushing blow with the flat
side of a weapon, potentially causing stunning.
en:
A crushing blow with the flat
side of a weapon, potentially causing stunning.
it:
Un colpo devastante con il lato piatto Di un'arma,
che può causare stordimento.

Original:
A powerful blow using the guard
or hilt to strike at close range.
en:
A powerful blow using the guard
or hilt to strike at close range.
it:
Un colpo potente che usa la guardia O l'elsa per
colpire a distanza ravvicinata.

Original:
A powerful diagonal slash
that's difficult to block.
en:
A powerful diagonal slash
that's difficult to block.
it:
Un potente fendente diagonale difficile da
bloccare.

Original:
A series of cuts that form
an X pattern on the target.
en:
A series of cuts that form
an X pattern on the target.
it:
Una serie di tagli che formano un disegno a X sul
bersaglio.

Original:
A series of quick, circular
slashes that can hit multiple enemies.
en:
A series of quick, circular
slashes that can hit multiple enemies.
it:
Una serie di rapidi fendenti circolari che possono
colpire più nemici.

Original:
A calculated strike at the
exact moment the enemy is vulnerable.
en:
A calculated strike at the
exact moment the enemy is vulnerable.
it:
Un attacco calcolato nel momento Esatto in cui il
nemico è vulnerabile.

Original:
A devastating lunge that puts
all power into a single strike.
en:
A devastating lunge that puts
all power into a single strike.
it:
Un affondo devastante che concentra tutta la
potenza in un unico colpo.

Original:
The ultimate melee technique combining
multiple movements into one devastating attack.
en:
The ultimate melee technique combining
multiple movements into one devastating attack.
it:
La tecnica corpo a corpo definitiva che combina
più movimenti in un unico attacco devastante.

Original:
Summons a falling star that crashes into enemies,
causing massive light damage to all targets.
en:
Summons a falling star that crashes into enemies,
causing massive light damage to all targets.
it:
Evoca una stella cadente che si schianta sui
nemici, causando ingenti danni leggeri a tutti i
bersagli.

Original:
Commands plants and wooden objects to attack,
dealing Metal-type damage to enemies.
en:
Commands plants and wooden objects to attack,
dealing Metal-type damage to enemies.
it:
Comanda alle piante e agli oggetti di legno di
attaccare, infliggendo danni di tipo metallo ai
nemici.

Original:
Channels the emptiness of the void, creating a
sense of longing that drains enemies' will to fight.
en:
Channels the emptiness of the void, creating a
sense of longing that drains enemies' will to fight.
it:
Incanala il vuoto, creando un senso di desiderio
che prosciuga la volontà di combattere dei nemici.

Original:
Harmonizes with the natural life energy of allies,
healing and removing negative status effects.
en:
Harmonizes with the natural life energy of allies,
healing and removing negative status effects.
it:
Armonizza l'energia vitale naturale degli alleati,
guarendo e rimuovendo gli effetti di stato
negativi.

Original:
Fires a beam that accelerates decomposition,
causing damage and lowering COS.
en:
Fires a beam that accelerates decomposition,
causing damage and lowering COS.
it:
Spara un raggio che accelera la decomposizione,
causando danni e riducendo cOS.

Original:
Creates a sudden burst of shadow energy during
an eclipse, damaging all enemies.
en:
Creates a sudden burst of shadow energy during
an eclipse, damaging all enemies.
it:
Crea un'improvvisa esplosione di energia oscura
durante un'eclissi, danneggiando tutti i nemici.

Original:
Branches the timeline, creating alternate versions
of allies that can absorb damage for them.
en:
Branches the timeline, creating alternate versions
of allies that can absorb damage for them.
it:
Ramifica la linea temporale, creando versioni
alternative di alleati che possono assorbire i
danni per loro.

Original:
Empowers allies with ancient glyphs,
providing significant stat boosts.
en:
Empowers allies with ancient glyphs,
providing significant stat boosts.
it:
Potenzia gli alleati con glifi antichi, fornendo
significativi potenziamenti alle statistiche.

Original:
Creates painfully dissonant tones that damage
enemies and disrupt spellcasting.
en:
Creates painfully dissonant tones that damage
enemies and disrupt spellcasting.
it:
Crea toni dolorosamente dissonanti che danneggiano
i nemici e interrompono il lancio degli
incantesimi.

Original:
Fires a barrage of ice shards that
hit all enemies multiple times.
en:
Fires a barrage of ice shards that
hit all enemies multiple times.
it:
Spara una raffica di schegge di ghiaccio che
colpiscono tutti i nemici più volte.

Original:
Creates a field where opposites coexist,
causing confusion and disorientation.
en:
Creates a field where opposites coexist,
causing confusion and disorientation.
it:
Crea un campo in cui gli opposti coesistono,
causando confusione e disorientamento.

Original:
Distorts visual perception with kaleidoscopic patterns,
causing confusion and lowering accuracy.
en:
Distorts visual perception with kaleidoscopic patterns,
causing confusion and lowering accuracy.
it:
Distorce la percezione visiva con schemi
caleidoscopici, causando confusione e riducendo la
precisione.

Original:
Transforms an ally's body into luminous energy,
greatly increasing all stats.
en:
Transforms an ally's body into luminous energy,
greatly increasing all stats.
it:
Trasforma il corpo di un alleato in energia
luminosa, aumentando notevolmente tutte le
statistiche.

Original:
Disrupts enemies' magnetic fields, causing
nausea and lowering various stats.
en:
Disrupts enemies' magnetic fields, causing
nausea and lowering various stats.
it:
Disturba i campi magnetici dei nemici, causando
nausea e riducendo varie statistiche.

Original:
Performs a dark ritual that sacrifices some of the
caster's HP to damage all enemies.
en:
Performs a dark ritual that sacrifices some of the
caster's HP to damage all enemies.
it:
Esegue un rituale oscuro che sacrifica Parte dei
hP dell'incantatore per danneggiare tutti i
nemici.

Original:
Calls down a powerful beam from orbit
that devastates a single target.
en:
Calls down a powerful beam from orbit
that devastates a single target.
it:
Richiama un potente raggio dall'orbita che devasta
un singolo bersaglio.

Original:
Creates an illusion that lures enemies to
attack a phantom target instead of allies.
en:
Creates an illusion that lures enemies to
attack a phantom target instead of allies.
it:
Crea un'illusione che induce i nemici ad attaccare
un bersaglio fantasma invece che gli alleati.

Original:
Manipulates the fundamental essence of all things,
restoring HP, MP, and increasing all stats.
en:
Manipulates the fundamental essence of all things,
restoring HP, MP, and increasing all stats.
it:
Manipola l'essenza fondamentale di tutte le cose,
ripristinando HP, MP e aumentando tutte le
statistiche.

Original:
Creates a shock wave of resonant energy that
damages enemies and disables magical abilities.
en:
Creates a shock wave of resonant energy that
damages enemies and disables magical abilities.
it:
Crea un'onda d'urto di energia risonante che
danneggia i nemici e disattiva le abilità magiche.

Original:
Creates a mirror reflection of the target's soul,
revealing and potentially reversing status effects.
en:
Creates a mirror reflection of the target's soul,
revealing and potentially reversing status effects.
it:
Crea un riflesso speculare dell'anima del
bersaglio, rivelando e potenzialmente invertendo
gli effetti di stato.

Original:
Rapidly alternates between extreme heat and cold,
shattering enemy COSs.
en:
Rapidly alternates between extreme heat and cold,
shattering enemy COSs.
it:
Alterna rapidamente caldo e freddo estremi,
distruggendo COS nemica.

Original:
Opens a portal to the underworld that damages
enemies and potentially causes instant death.
en:
Opens a portal to the underworld that damages
enemies and potentially causes instant death.
it:
Apre un portale per gli inferi che danneggia i
nemici E potenzialmente causa morte istantanea.

Original:
Compresses a vortex of energy into a tiny space,
creating an explosion that damages all enemies.
en:
Compresses a vortex of energy into a tiny space,
creating an explosion that damages all enemies.
it:
Comprime un vortice di energia in uno Spazio
minuscolo, creando un'esplosione che danneggia
tutti i nemici.

Original:
Summons a swarm of ethereal lights that confuse
and distract enemies while causing damage.
en:
Summons a swarm of ethereal lights that confuse
and distract enemies while causing damage.
it:
Evoca uno sciame di luci eteree che confondono e
distraggono i nemici, infliggendo danni.

Original:
Creates a sudden, blinding flash of light that
damages and potentially blinds all enemies.
en:
Creates a sudden, blinding flash of light that
damages and potentially blinds all enemies.
it:
Crea un lampo di luce improvviso e accecante che
danneggia e potenzialmente acceca tutti i nemici.

Original:
Harvests dream energy from sleeping targets,
dealing damage and restoring MP to the caster.
en:
Harvests dream energy from sleeping targets,
dealing damage and restoring MP to the caster.
it:
Raccoglie energia onirica dai bersagli
addormentati, Infliggendo danni e ripristinando MP
all'incantatore.

Original:
Summons a serpent made of
living flame that coils around
enemies and burns them.
en:
Summons a serpent made of
living flame that coils around
enemies and burns them.
it:
Evoca un serpente fatto di fiamme vive che si
avvolge intorno ai nemici e li brucia.

Original:
Calls down a massive storm of
lightning that bounces between
multiple targets.
en:
Calls down a massive storm of
lightning that bounces between
multiple targets.
it:
Richiama una gigantesca tempesta di fulmini che
rimbalza tra più bersagli.

Original:
Creates a whirlpool of caustic
liquid that rapidly dissolves
enemy COSs.
en:
Creates a whirlpool of caustic
liquid that rapidly dissolves
enemy COSs.
it:
Crea un vortice di liquido caustico che dissolve
rapidamente COS nemica.

Original:
Summons countless daggers of
ice that rain down from above,
piercing enemies.
en:
Summons countless daggers of
ice that rain down from above,
piercing enemies.
it:
Evoca innumerevoli pugnali di ghiaccio che piovono
dall'alto, trafiggendo i nemici.

Original:
Unleashes shadow tendrils that 
emerge from the void to siphon life from enemies.
en:
Unleashes shadow tendrils that 
emerge from the void to siphon life from enemies.
it:
Scatena tentacoli d'ombra che emergono Dal vuoto
per risucchiare la vita dai nemici.

Original:
Unleashes the raw power of chaos, 
causing unpredictable but devastating damage.
en:
Unleashes the raw power of chaos, 
causing unpredictable but devastating damage.
it:
Scatena la potenza pura del caos, Causando danni
imprevedibili ma devastanti.

Original:
Raises massive crystalline
spires from the ground that
impale enemies and shatter.
en:
Raises massive crystalline
spires from the ground that
impale enemies and shatter.
it:
Solleva enormi guglie cristalline dal terreno che
trafiggono i nemici e li frantumano.

Original:
Creates a devastating cyclone
that tears enemies apart with
razor-sharp wind blades.
en:
Creates a devastating cyclone
that tears enemies apart with
razor-sharp wind blades.
it:
Crea un ciclone devastante che fa a pezzi i nemici
con lame di vento affilate come rasoi.

Original:
Channels the power of a
distant sun, creating a
miniature solar flare.
en:
Channels the power of a
distant sun, creating a
miniature solar flare.
it:
Incanala la potenza di un sole lontano, creando un
brillamento solare in miniatura.

Original:
Creates a field of electromagnetic 
energy that overloads nervous systems.
en:
Creates a field of electromagnetic 
energy that overloads nervous systems.
it:
Crea un campo di energia elettromagnetica che
sovraccarica il sistema nervoso.

Original:
Summons the core of a volcano to
erupt beneath enemies, causing massive damage.
en:
Summons the core of a volcano to
erupt beneath enemies, causing massive damage.
it:
Evoca il nucleo di un vulcano che esplode sotto i
nemici, causando danni ingenti.

Original:
Fuses opposing elements into a
volatile mixture that creates
a devastating explosion.
en:
Fuses opposing elements into a
volatile mixture that creates
a devastating explosion.
it:
Fonde elementi opposti in una miscela volatile che
crea un'esplosione devastante.

Original:
Concentrates celestial energy
into a beam of light that
purges darkness and causes
damage.
en:
Concentrates celestial energy
into a beam of light that
purges darkness and causes
damage.
it:
Concentra l'energia celeste in un raggio di luce
che purifica l'oscurità e causa danni.

Original:
Opens a gateway to a dimension
of nightmares, unleashing
terror upon enemies.
en:
Opens a gateway to a dimension
of nightmares, unleashing
terror upon enemies.
it:
Apre un varco verso una dimensione degli incubi,
scatenando il terrore sui nemici.

Original:
Summons an interdimensional entity 
that devours the life force of enemies.
en:
Summons an interdimensional entity 
that devours the life force of enemies.
it:
Evoca un'entità interdimensionale che divora la
forza vitale dei nemici.

Original:
Creates a vortex of caustic
gases that corrode enemies
from the inside out.
en:
Creates a vortex of caustic
gases that corrode enemies
from the inside out.
it:
Crea un vortice di gas caustici che corrodono i
nemici dall'interno.

Original:
Transforms water into a highly
acidic compound that dissolves
enemy armor and flesh.
en:
Transforms water into a highly
acidic compound that dissolves
enemy armor and flesh.
it:
Trasforma l'acqua in un composto altamente acido
che dissolve l'armatura e la carne del nemico.

Original:
Showers enemies with
razor-sharp obsidian shards
that cause bleeding wounds.
en:
Showers enemies with
razor-sharp obsidian shards
that cause bleeding wounds.
it:
Inonda i nemici con schegge di ossidiana affilate
come rasoi che causano ferite sanguinanti.

Original:
Creates a field of absolute
zero temperature that freezes
enemies solid.
en:
Creates a field of absolute
zero temperature that freezes
enemies solid.
it:
Crea un campo di temperatura pari allo Zero
assoluto che congela i nemici.

Original:
Summons the heart of a dying
star to create a devastating
explosion of heat and light.
en:
Summons the heart of a dying
star to create a devastating
explosion of heat and light.
it:
Evoca il cuore di una stella morente per creare
una devastante esplosione di calore e luce.

Original:
Creates a howling vortex of atmosphere 
that tears enemies to shreds with debris.
en:
Creates a howling vortex of atmosphere 
that tears enemies to shreds with debris.
it:
Crea un vortice atmosferico ululante che fa a

poison.

it: Let’s do the time warp again!

The ultimate enhancement spell that maximizes

Un incantesimo caotico di energia magica grezza
